revised_title: Interaction of Mesons with a Potential Field: A Study of the Sakata-Taketani Wave Equation
tldr: This article explores the interaction of mesons with a potential field using the Sakata-Taketani wave equation. The author develops the wave equation and discusses the behavior of charged vector mesons in an electromagnetic field. The article focuses on the motion of mesons in a central field and the radial wave equations, providing a foundation for understanding meson interactions and scattering phenomena.
